snippet: The police said the off-duty officer and the other man were  shot inside the same house, but that neither of the men lived there.
abstract: Two people are wounded, including an off-duty New York City police officer, in a shooting in Queens; details of what prompted the gunfire remain unclear.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: The police said the off-duty officer and the other man were  shot inside the same house, but that neither of the men lived there.

headline.main: 2 Are Wounded, Including an Off-Duty Officer, in a Shooting in Queens
headline.print_headline: 2 Are Wounded, Including an Off-Duty Officer, in a Shooting in Queens
